trans-unit.source: Provides a XAML-friendly implementation of a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MessageFilter"></xref> that filters on a single action.
trans-unit.target: Ger en XAML-eget implementering av en <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MessageFilter"> </xref> som filtrerar på en enda åtgärd.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"> </xref> klass.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the action for the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger åtgärden för den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The action for the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Åtgärden för den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the current <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"></xref> is equal to the specified <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Anger om aktuellt <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"> </xref> är lika med det angivna <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"></xref> to compare with the current <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"> </xref> ska jämföras med aktuellt <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"></xref> is equal to the current <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om den angivna <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"> </xref> är lika med aktuellt <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"> </xref>, annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar den hashkoden för den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"> </xref> instans.

trans-unit.source: The hash code for the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Hash-koden för den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"> </xref> instans.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified message’s action matches the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter.Action*> of this <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Anger om åtgärden med den angivna meddelandet matchar den <xref:System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter.Action*>av denna <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"> </xref>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter.Action*>

trans-unit.source: A message’s action is specified by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeaders.Action%2A> property of the message’s <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message.Headers%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Åtgärden för ett meddelande anges av <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeaders.Action%2A>egenskapen för meddelandets <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message.Headers%2A>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message.Headers%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeaders.Action%2A>

trans-unit.source: The message to compare.
trans-unit.target: Meddelanden som ska jämföras.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the action matches; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>om instruktionen matchar; Annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the action of the message contained by the specified message buffer matches the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter.Action*> of this <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Anger om åtgärden meddelandet finns i den angivna meddelandebufferten matchar den <xref:System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter.Action*>av denna <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"> </xref>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter.Action*>

trans-unit.source: A message’s action is specified by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeaders.Action%2A> property of the message’s <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message.Headers%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Åtgärden för ett meddelande anges av <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeaders.Action%2A>egenskapen för meddelandets <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message.Headers%2A>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message.Headers%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeaders.Action%2A>

trans-unit.source: The message buffer that contains the message to compare.
trans-unit.target: Meddelandebufferten som innehåller meddelandet ska jämföras.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the action matches; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>om instruktionen matchar; Annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref:System.String> representation of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar en <xref:System.String>representation av den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"> </xref>.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter.Action%2A> property is set, its value is used to build the string representation; otherwise, the base class <xref:System.Object.ToString%2A> value is returned.
trans-unit.target: Om den <xref:System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter.Action%2A>egenskapen är dess värde används för att skapa den sträng som innehåller, annars basklassen <xref:System.Object.ToString%2A>returneras värdet.</xref:System.Object.ToString%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter.Action%2A>

trans-unit.source: The current <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Aktuellt <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"> </xref>.
